name: Multi-Run Same Day
question: Do 3 dispatches of 1-checkout workflow in one UTC day produce 3 clones and 1 unique?

hypothesis.reasoning: 3 separate workflow runs Ã— 1 checkout each = 3 total clones. All use GITHUB_TOKEN = same bot identity. GitHub moderator says unique = 1 per day regardless of runs.

actions.notes: Trigger 3 times with ~1hr spacing within the same UTC day.

results.notes: Tests unique dedup model. If unique=3, unique is per-run not per-day.
